Most voting sites only allow you to vote once per day and so this shouldn’t be an issue to your server a timer would be unnecessary because their is already one pre made with the Vote4Cash system.

item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

ProjectPvpTehe:

please dude :L see this is why google is better they actually help.

We did help you. Big time. You were about to drop your entire server vote list by 23x. Besides, the actual website has a timer on it. Why would you need a timer too? That’s called extra code, space waste, and inefficient programming.

item.title: Help urgently 317 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ProjectPvpTehe ProjectPvpTehe
item.description:
@ProjectPvpTehe wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=up&server=projectpvp123.no-ip.biz", 12000); c.getItems().addItem(995, 20000000); c.sendMessage("Thank You For Voting For ProjectPVP. "); c.sendMessage("Please vote every day!");

How do I add a timer to this so you can only do the command once every 24 hours?

PLEASE HELP!!

Read full topic
